title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Fenix Simulations A320 - Calibrating the VelocityOne Flight
description:
In this video we will look at how to calibrate the VelocityOne Flight so it can be used with Fenix Simulations A320. We start first with a review of the options available in the setting menu of flight simulator. After this we move over to the aircraft where we will do the calibration piece.
